title: Task 1: Identify a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not provide two accurate identifiers for the selected work of art.
Response provides two accurate identifiers for the selected work of art.

title: Task 2: Describe visual elements of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe the specific content of Travelers among Mountains and Streams.
Response does accurately describe the specific content of Travelers among Mountains and Streams.

title: Task 3: Describe visual elements of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe the specific content of the selected work.
Response does accurately describe specific content of the selected work.

title: Task 4: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific visual evidence from both works to explain one similarity or difference in how the two works represent the natural world.
Response uses specific visual evidence from both works to explain one similarity or difference in how the two works represent the natural world.

title: Task 5: Articulate a defensible claim that explains the meaning or significance of similarities or differences between two works of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not explain one similarity or difference in how both works convey ideas about the relationship between humans and nature within their respective cultures.
Response does accurately explain one similarity or difference in how both works convey ideas about the relationship between humans and nature within their respective cultures.

title: Task 6: Explain how the evidence justifies the claim.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific evidence about Travelers among Mountains and Streams in the explanation.
Response does accurately use specific evidence about Travelers among Mountains and Streams in the explanation.

title: Task 7: Explain how the evidence justifies the claim.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not use specific evidence about the selected work in the explanation
